name: http_sdk_examples
description: FastEdge HTTP applications for integration tests - basic functionality

scripts.build:all: npm-run-all -p build:basic build:downstream-fetch build:downstream-modify-response build:headers build:variables-and-secrets
scripts.copy:wasm: npm-run-all -p copy:basic copy:downstream-fetch copy:downstream-modify-response copy:headers copy:variables-and-secrets
scripts.copy:basic: npx cross-env NAME=sdk-basic npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:downstream-fetch: npx cross-env NAME=sdk-downstream-fetch npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:downstream-modify-response: npx cross-env NAME=sdk-downstream-modify-response npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:headers: npx cross-env NAME=sdk-headers npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:variables-and-secrets: npx cross-env NAME=sdk-variables-and-secrets npm run mv:file
